Quote: Let's go, Appa! Come on, boy! Look I'm sorry, but Katara and Sokka aren't coming to the Fire Nation with us. If they got hurt, I'd never forgive myself. So get your big butt off the ground and let's go!
I think his big butt is trying to tell ya something.
Please don't go Aang. The world can't afford to lose you to the Fire Nation. Neither can I.
I need to get to the Fire Temple before the sun sets on the solstice. That's today!
Sailing into Fire Nation waters ... Of all the foolish things you've done in your sixteen years, Prince Zuko, this is the most foolish!
Have you completely forgotten that the Fire Lord banished you?
I'm chasing the Avatar! My father will understand why I am returning home!
You give him too much credit. My brother is not the understanding type!
Uh, really Prince Zuko, couldn't you shoot them down with something more fragrant?
We have to get out of Zuko's range, before he shoots another hot stinker at us!
Can't you make Appa go any faster?
Let's run this blockade!
Please Prince Zuko! If the Fire Nation captures you, there is nothing I can do! Do not follow the Avatar.
The Avatar. And the banished prince. This must be my lucky day.
You did it buddy. Nice flying.
No! I'm good. Refreshed and ready to fight some firebenders!
We are the Fire Sages. Guardians of the temple of the Avatar.
If the Avatar contacts Roku, there's no telling how powerful the boy will become! Split up and find him.
Firebenders aren't our friends!
If Zhao wants to follow a trail of smoke, then that's exactly what I'll let him do.
Many generations of Fire Sages guarded this Fire Temple long before me. We all have a strong spiritual connection to this place.
Things have changed. In the past, the sages were loyal only to the Avatar. When Roku died, the sages eagerly awaited for the next Avatar to return. But he never came.
Hey don't feel bad. You're only a hundred years late!
You've really outdone yourself this time, Sokka.
Sokka, you're a genius!
Did the definition of genius change over the last hundred years?
It's good to see you Aang. What took you so long?
Two traitors in one day, the Fire Lord will be pleased.
Fire Lord Sozin used that comet to begin the War. He and his firebending army harnessed its incredible power, and dealt a deadly first strike against the other nations.

Sozin's Comet will return by the end of this summer, and Fire Lord Ozai will use its power to finish the War, once and for all. If he succeeds, even the Avatar won't be able to restore balance to the world. Aang. You must defeat the Fire Lord, before the comet arrives.
Mastering the elements takes years of discipline and practice. But if the world is to survive, you must do it by summer's end.
I know you can do it Aang. For you have done it before.
No Prince, no Avatar! Apparently, the only thing I do have is five traitors!
